sentences.en: He is the one man who could retrieve that situation.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一能挽回局面的人。

sentences.en: I explained the situation to everyone.
sentences.cn: 我向大家介绍了一下情况。

sentences.en: I find myself growing increasingly angry at the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 对如此荒谬可笑的情况我感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: It was time for a re-examina-tion of the situation.
sentences.cn: 该重新审视一下局势了。

sentences.en: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation.
sentences.cn: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

sentences.en: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.cn: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

sentences.en: The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening.
sentences.cn: 安全部队不得不介入，以防止局势进一步恶化。

sentences.en: The situation is long past the stage when anyone's advice would help.
sentences.cn: 情况早变了，不是谁提个建议就能补救的事儿。

sentences.en: The Turkish situation makes the lead in tomorrow's Guardian.
sentences.cn: 土耳其局势将成为明天《卫报》的头条。

sentences.en: The uncertainty created by this situation must be confusing for you.
sentences.cn: 这种局面所造成的不确定性肯定让你感到困惑。

sentences.en: The union has written to Zurich asking for clarification of the situation.
sentences.cn: 该联盟已致函苏黎世，要求将情况解释清楚。

sentences.en: There have been riots before and the situation is volatile.
sentences.cn: 以前曾发生过暴乱，现在局势不太稳定。

sentences.en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

sentences.en: This is such an unforeseeable situation that anything could happen.
sentences.cn: 这种情况很难预测，什么事都有可能发生。

sentences.en: We sat in Lily's sunroom while I sketched in the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在莉莉的日光浴室里，我把目前形势的细节情况又补充说明了一下。

sentences.en: We were in a disaster situation that defies description.
sentences.cn: 我们陷入了难以言表的糟糕处境。

sentences.en: You couldn't be more mistaken, Alex. You've utterly misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯，你真是大错特错，你对局势的判断根本不对。

phrases.tran_cn: 竞争态势；竞争环境；竞争性的局面
n. 形势分析；情况分析

trans.tran_en: a combination of all the things that are happening and all the conditions that exist at a particular time in a particular place
